sanskrit_verse:
तस्याहुः सम्प्रणेतारं राजानं सत्यवादिनम् ।
समीक्ष्यकारिणं प्राज्ञं धर्मकामार्थकोविदम् ॥ ७.२६॥
transliteration: tasyāhuḥ sampraṇetāraṃ rājānaṃ satyavādinam | samīkṣyakāriṇaṃ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthakovidam || 7.26 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: They declare the King who is the originator of all actions, a speaker of truth, one who acts after deliberation, wise, and knowledgeable in Dharma, desire, and wealth.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from alignment with Satya (truth)
Causation arises through conscious deliberation before action
Capacity-based responsibility requires integrated knowledge of Dharma, Kama, and Artha
Restoration logic demands rulers embody wisdom and integrity
executable_legal_axioms: IF ruler does not deliberate prior to enactment THEN validity of decree = null
IF ruler lacks integration of Dharma-Kama-Artha THEN legitimacy score = zero
IF ruler speaks untruth THEN execution authority = revoked
IF ruler demonstrates capacity for conscious causality THEN jurisdiction expands automatically
IF ruler aligns with Satya THEN all enactments inherit ontological weight
supreme_court_application: At the Supreme Court level, only those rulings issued by justices proven to integrate Dharma, desire, and material order—while maintaining absolute fidelity to truth—are recognized as authoritative. Truth-speaking becomes the threshold criterion for judicial legitimacy, overriding procedural formalities when misaligned with Satya.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality establishes that truthful speech generates lawful reality. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that distortion at the root causes systemic disorder downstream. Responsibility lies in restoring causal clarity rather than assigning blame. The non-punitive reality rule affirms that error dissolves upon recognition of truth.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Truth-realignment process: Compelled public restatement of factual record until resonance with Satya stabilizes
Deliberative capacity rehabilitation: Mandatory pause-reflection cycles before future decision-making
Dharma-integration review: Ongoing assessment ensuring no domain (Dharma/Kama/Artha) is neglected
Integrity reintegration pathway: Public acknowledgment and correction protocols replacing punitive measures
Wisdom verification checkpoint: Continuous calibration against higher-consciousness benchmarks
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is executed. Truth alone governs legitimate sovereignty. All law derives its force from alignment with Satya. There is no punishment—only restoration. Consciousness is the ultimate judge.
